gustmessage: Thank you for choosing our hospital for your healthcare needs. We constantly work to improve and meet your expectations. To serve our patients better, kindly spare a few minutes to fill out this feedback form. Your opinion is of immense value to us.
detractor: Please describe reason for low rating
name: Audit Name
happythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
unhappythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
gloves: Have you checked own medications and verified the medication order, including drug name, dose, route, time, and frequency?
mask: Did you confirm that the prescribed medicine is written in the order?
cap: Is the medication tray stocked with all required articles?
apron: Did you perform handwashing or use hand rub before administering the medication to patient?
lead_apron: Did you greet and identify the patient using two identification methods?
use_xray_barrior: Have you explained the procedure to the patient and verified their allergic status?
patient_file: Did you check and ensure that all medications are present at the patient’s side with patient’s file?
verified: Have you verified the medicine for its name, expiry date, color, and texture?
indication: Did you explain the drug indication, expected action, reaction, and side effects to the patient or relatives?
medicine: Is all medicine available for use at the bedside on time?
alert: For high-alert drugs, did you ensure verification by one staff nurse before administration?
dilution: Have you labeled the prepared medicine with the drug name and dilution?
administering: Are you administering the medication as per approved techniques?
privacy: Did you provide privacy for the patient if needed?
vials: For multi-dose vials, did you note the date and time of opening on the medicine?
cannula: Did you check the patency and status of the cannula, including the date and time of cannulation near the site?
flush: After IV administration, did you flush the line with normal saline?
medications: Are IV medications being run on time, and have they been discontinued or discarded appropriately?
reassess: After administering the medication, did you reassess the patient for any reactions and ensure their comfort?
oral: For oral medications, have you ensured that the patient has taken the medications and that no medicine is left unattended?
discarded: Have you discarded waste and replaced used articles?
handwashing: Did you perform handwashing or use hand rub after the procedure?
procedures: Have you recorded the procedure in the documents immediately after completing it?
